name: Super Bikes 3
overview:
The third instalment of the hugely successful Super Bikes arcade series is here, with even more dazzling graphics, improved gameplay and a super stylish, colourful cabinet design.

Presented in bright, eye-catching colours, Super Bikes 3 gets engines revving with a large ride-on motorbike that ensures you feel well and truly part of this fast-paced, fierce racing arcade game.
Become a racing champion with eight unique rider characters and eight killer tracks. You'll have your skills put to the test with sharp turns, wandering bends and unforgettable scenery as you and seven other riders battle it out to finish the race out on top.

This striking arcade cabinet features an illuminated light box, ensuring the logo stands out even from across the arcade room. Chrome arches either side of the screen give the whole setup an incredibly sleek look, while two speakers on either side of the rider ensure total immersion and a truly unique arcade experience.
